data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
It's important to solve systems of equations, and this module
    solves systems of equations. There really isn't much else to say.
    It's object oriented. It can be used for many important things that
    require... systems of equations solving I suppose. They don't teach
    us this stuff in Algebra for them not to be Perl Modules, right?
